author: bdaniel
msg: Fix the removal of direct policy sets when external policy sets are attached. Also, allow policy sets to attach externally to interface elements.

author: bdaniel
msg: Add a boolean to PolicySet to determine if it has been attached via external attachment

author: boisvert
msg: Also:  it's now possible to provide artifact content with,
Also:  poms associated with packages are no longer created directly
in the local repository.  they are created alongside packages
under 'target' which is more consistent.  the local repository
is therefore only written when installing/downloading artifacts
